org.resthub.web.context.jaxb

Class JAXBContextResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.context.jaxb.JAXBContextResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver<JAXBContext>

    @Provider
public class JAXBContextResolver
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver<JAXBContext>
    This resolver is used by Jersey to (un)marshall classes annotated with XMLRootElement annotation.

    Particulary relevant for managing generic collections.

    Must be declared as a Spring bean when used with Spring.
    Author:
    feugy , bmeurant

      • setClasspathPatterns

        public void setClasspathPatterns(String classpathPatterns)
        Classpath patterns to scan for XML root elements.
        Pattern could use * or ** jokers.
        You can specify more than one pattern by using , or ; separators.

        Following values are valid classpath patterns :
        • classpath:org/mydomain/myproject/**/domain/model/*.class
        • classpath*:org/mydomain/myproject/**/domain/model/*. class
        • classpath*:org/mydomain/myproject1/**/domain/model/*. class
        • classpath*:org/mydomain/myproject2/**/domain/model/* ;.class
        Be attentive that using this property, entities-scan based configuration is ignored
        Parameters:
        classpathPatterns - The specified classpath patterns.

      • getContext

        public JAXBContext getContext(Class<?> type)
        Gives access to the JAX-B context.
        Specified by:
        getContext in interface javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver<JAXBContext>
        Parameters:
        type - Class of the (un)marshalled object.
        Returns:
        the relevant JAX-B context, or null if this context is not applicable.
